scripts.dev: concurrently "npm start --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend" "nodemon --watch shared --ext js,ts,json --exec \"npm run sync-types\""
scripts.sync-types: copyfiles -u 2 shared/types/*.* backend/src/shared/types && copyfiles -u 2 shared/types/*.* frontend/src/shared/types && copyfiles -u 2 shared/consts/*.* backend/src/shared/consts && copyfiles -u 2 shared/consts/*.* frontend/src/shared/consts && copyfiles -u 2 shared/helpers/*.* backend/src/shared/helpers && copyfiles -u 2 shared/helpers/*.* frontend/src/shared/helpers
